front.title: P2P Streaming for Mobile Nodes: Scenarios and Related Issues

abstract.t: The scenarios where a Peer-to-Peer Streaming Protocol (PPSP) contains mobile nodes need special considerations. An analysis of all the scenarios that involve mobile nodes is necessary to provide the guidelines to PPSP protocol design and applicability. This document describes the major scenarios for a PPSP network with mobile nodes and identifies some of the key issues.
